      • distance

        public static double distance(double lat1,
                              double lat2,
                              double lon1,
                              double lon2,
                              double el1,
                              double el2)
        Calculate distance between two points in latitude and longitude taking into account height difference. If you are not interested in height difference pass 0.0. Uses Haversine method as its base. lat1, lon1 Start point lat2, lon2 End point el1 Start altitude in meters el2 End altitude in meters
        Parameters:
        lat1 - representing the latitude of point A
        lat2 - representing the latitude of point B
        lon1 - representing the longitude of point A
        lon2 - representing the longitude of point B
        el1 - representing the altitude of point A
        el2 - representing the altitude of point B
        Returns:
        Distance in Meters

        Returns:
